about_the_game:
The 1983 classic multi-room platformer Montezuma’s Revenge returns in retro pixel art glory, now complete for the first time as creator Robert Jaeger envisioned it! Now more than 4 times the size of its original release, Montezuma’s Revenge: Director’s Cut is both a love letter to long-time fans and an invitation to new adventurers!

Run, jump and climb your way through tricky chambers to collect valuable artifacts, avoid perilous traps and fiendish enemies, discover keys to progress and find a way to escape with treasures untold! This special expanded release of the original game is made available exclusively as an add-on for Montezuma’s Revenge - The 40th Anniversary Edition, a modern 2.5D remake celebrating the game’s storied history!

Features:

  • Discover an expanded map 4 times the size of the 1983 original!

  • Explore tricky chambers filled with traps, treasures and roving baddies.

  • Collect valuable artifacts as you solve the ruins’ many mysteries!

  • Enjoy authentic retro pixel art presentation.

  • Relive a timeless video game classic in its complete form!
